message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.MM

The paper deals with the problem of adaptive and sequential optimization of beamforming vectors in mmWave communication, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The proposed algorithm also involves active learning and search strategies, which are topics related to machine learning (cs.LG) and systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper specifically focuses on mmWave communication, which falls under the category of multimedia (cs.MM).
